== About me ==
I've being using Linux for a while now, since 2004. I started from the beloved LiveCD Knoppix and tried and experienced different distributions along the years (Mandrake, Slackware and more). After Ubuntu came out I've migrated to it and 'stuck' with it for a long time.<<BR>>
I've started to get involved with the Hebrew translation of Ubuntu (and GNOME a little bit) from 2005 and kept being involved since.<<BR>>
In the recent year Linux has been the primary OS on my laptop, Ubuntu 10.04 (Lucid Lynx) alpha at first and after a while I moved to Arch.<<BR>>
I'm trying to get involved with the Hebrew translation as much as I can (between University and other activities).
